thread.title: Linda

author: Linda
title: Linda
text:
I spent a great deal of time researching mattresses before buying the Saatva, and shopped in stores as well. (I had actually purchased another brand online first and wasn't happy with it, but it was returnable so I hoped buying the Saatva wouldn't be another disappointment. The biggest issue is that my partner had a back injury years ago and needs a very firm mattress. She was really hesitant when I suggested the Saatva but after reading the reviews and talking to the company reps, I felt good about my choice.
Turns out it was the right one. My partner LOVES this mattress, and so do I. We've only had it a few days, but it was comfortable right from the start. I was concerned that it might end up being too firm for me, but I love this mattress, too.
Saatva's customer service was excellent. Delivery and setup was a breeze. The mattress quality is outstanding. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
